elements.content: Show me examples for the following components in this chat: text, carousel, text, code, link-list, formula, formula, table, list, text, molecule, molecule, file-upload, card, card, card, card, card, error, loading, html-text, tags, chart, chart, chart
1. Here is a <clabs-chat-text> element:

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

3. Here is a <clabs-chat-text> element of type annotated-text:
Abraham Lincoln article on Wikipedia

Abraham Lincoln was an American lawyer, politician, and statesman who served as the 16th [president of the United States](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_United_States) from 1861 until his [assassination](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assassination_of_Abraham_Lincoln) in 1865. Lincoln led the United States through the [American Civil War](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_Civil_War), defending the nation as a constitutional [union](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Union_(American_Civil_War)
 [Many more links are available in this article](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Log_cabin,https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kentucky,https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_frontier,https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Indiana).

10. Here is a <clabs-chat-text> element of type highlight-text:
IBM article from wikipedia.com

[International Business Machines Corporation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IBM) (using the trademark IBM), nicknamed [Big Blue](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Big_Blue), is an American [multinational](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multinational_corporation) [technology company](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Technology_company) headquartered in [Armonk, New York](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Armonk,_New_York) and present in over 175 countries. IBM is the largest industrial [research organization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Research_institute) in the world, with 19 research facilities across a dozen countries, having held the record for most annual [U.S.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States) [patents](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patent) generated by a business for 29 consecutive years from 1993 to 2021
